description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Radiant

Standard

Reach 2

+23 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+23 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Standard

The dragon teleports 5 squares, makes a claw attack, teleports 5 squares, and makes a claw attack against a different target.

Recharge 5-6

Minor, Recharge

Reach 2

+21 vs Fortitude; 3d8+6 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Radiant

Standard

Close blast 5

+21 vs Reflex; 3d8+4 radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Radiant, Teleportation

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets up to four enemies; +14 vs Reflex; 2d8+7 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 radiant damage and is dazed (save ends both). Effect: The dragon teleports to a space in the burst.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When the dragon is hit by an attack

The dragon gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the dragon teleports 6 squares.

HP 684; Bloodied 342 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 20 radiant 		Init +19 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 32Fort 29Ref 31Will 29
Speed 8, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 12, teleport 10
Ability ScoresStr 22 (+15)

Int 20 (+14)		Wis 22 (+15)
Cha 20 (+14)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Diplomacy +19, History +19, Insight +20, Intimidate +19, Religion +19Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 25 | Insight 30
